1d431f6e-f455-488d-938d-1839bdd433d1.description: Earners of the globally-recognized Project Management Professional (PMP) have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of project management concepts, tasks, and techniques that are applicable across virtually any industry and methodology. Earners are able to speak and understand the global language of project management. Individuals that earn this certification have demonstrated the knowledge and skills needed to initiate, plan, execute, monitor and control, and close a project.
1d431f6e-f455-488d-938d-1839bdd433d1.name: Project Management Professional (PMP)®

alignments.name: PMBOK® Guide
alignments.description: The PMP certification aligns to A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is the preeminent global standard for project management and provides the fundamental practices of the profession.

alignments.name: ISO 17024
alignments.description: The PMP certification maintains ISO 17024 accreditation, which outlines industry standards and best practices for certification bodies.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: Must have at least 3-5 years of experience leading and directing cross-functional project teams and responsibility for project delivery

Earner must have minimum of 35 hours of formal project management education. If you are an active CAPM certification holder, you do NOT need to document the 35 contact hours. Your project management education requirement is waived.
Successfully complete the 200 multiple-choice questions, 4 hour PMP® certification exam
Earn 60 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PMP certification.

8218134c-8e2b-4a96-be13-9a8fbb65a893.description: Earners of the globally-recognized Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) have demonstrated that they possess the knowledge in the principles and terminology of A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK® Guide). Earners are able to apply the knowledge to on-the-job experiences that develop growing levels of competence in the practice of project management.
8218134c-8e2b-4a96-be13-9a8fbb65a893.name: Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM)®

alignments.name: PMBOK® Guide
alignments.description: The CAPM certification is based on A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is the preeminent global standard for project management and provides the fundamental practices of the profession.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: Have a secondary degree, such as a high school diploma, GED (general educational development), or global equivalent.
Have at least 23 contact hours of project management education completed before the exam (PMI’s online Project Management Basics course can help fulfill this requirement)
Successfully complete the 150 multiple-choice question, 3 hour CAPM® certification exam
Earn 15 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the CAPM certification.

0278795f-7b75-4d74-ab8d-8e2f4c259f69.description: Earners of the globally-recognized PMI Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) have demonstrated their knowledge and skills in agile practices, tools and techniques that are applicable across virtually any industry and methodology. Earners have demonstrated their knowledge and experience with agile principles and mindset, value-driven delivery, stakeholder engagement, team performance, adaptive planning, problem detection and resolution, and continuous improvement.
0278795f-7b75-4d74-ab8d-8e2f4c259f69.name: PMI Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)®

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: High school diploma or secondary degree
Earner must have minimum of 21 hours of formal education in agile practices
12 months of general project experience within the last 5 years (A current PMP® or PgMP® will satisfy this requirement but is not required to apply for the PMI-ACP®)
8 months of agile project experience within the last 3 years
Successfully complete the 120 multiple-choice question, 3 hour PMI-ACP® certification exam
Earn 30 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PMI-ACP certification.

1349da49-2965-420a-8ddb-0ec33f0d4d4a.description: Earners of Kickoff’s Fundamentals of Waterfall Project Management badge have an essential understanding of waterfall processes and terminology. They’ve demonstrated key concepts, including: how to build project charters, identify project stakeholders, write clear requirements, sequence and assign work, create the project schedule, make risk mitigation plans, review the plan and stay aligned with sponsors, conduct a kick-off meeting, measure project success, and successfully close out a project.
1349da49-2965-420a-8ddb-0ec33f0d4d4a.name: Fundamentals of Waterfall Project Management

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Kickoff’s 45-minute Fundamentals of Waterfall Project Management course, including all activities, lessons, and modules.

e8cd4b32-6402-4fcd-b863-df0afaaff610.description: Earners of the globally-recognized PMI Risk Management Professional (PMI-RMP) have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of risk management concepts, tasks, and techniques. Earners have competence in the specialized area of assessing and identifying project risks to mitigate threats and capitalize on opportunities.
e8cd4b32-6402-4fcd-b863-df0afaaff610.name: PMI Risk Management Professional (PMI-RMP)®

alignments.name: Project Risk Management Practice Standard
alignments.description: The PMI-RMP certification aligns to the Project Risk Management Practice Standard, which provides a benchmark for the profession and defines the aspects of project risk management recognized as good practice.

alignments.name: PMBOK® Guide
alignments.description: The PMI-RMP certification references A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is the preeminent global standard for project management and provides the fundamental practices of the profession.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: With a four-year degree: A minimum of 24 months (two years) of professional project risk management within the last five consecutive years. 30 contact hours of formal education in the specialized area of project risk management

Without a four-year degree: A minimum of 36 months (three years) of professional project risk management within the last five consecutive years. 40 contact hours of formal education in the specialized area of project risk management

With a degree from a GAC accredited program: A minimum of 12 months (one year) of professional project risk management within the last five consecutive years. 30 contact hours of formal education in the specialized area of project risk management
Successfully complete the 115 multiple-choice question, 2.5 hour PMI-RMP® certification exam
Earn 30 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PMI-RMP certification.

69ac9f9b-e513-4850-807b-56848a7adfd7.description: Earners of Kickoff’s Fundamentals of Agile Project Management badge have an essential understanding of agile processes and terminology. They’ve demonstrated key concepts, including: how to establish a clear vision, build a high-performing team, set up a scrum board, create a backlog and user stories, run a sprint planning meeting, perform a daily scrum, conduct a sprint review and retrospective, measure sprint progress, and empower operations to support the product.
69ac9f9b-e513-4850-807b-56848a7adfd7.name: Fundamentals of Agile Project Management

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Kickoff’s 45-minute Fundamentals of Agile Project Management course, including all activities, lessons, and modules.

5ceefd25-46a5-41ae-89ea-893c0844f3dd.description: Disciplined Agile is a toolkit that focuses on the decisions one needs to consider, the options available, and the associated trade-offs. The Disciplined Agile Scrum Master credential holder has been formally evaluated on understanding the fundamentals of agile and lean approaches like Scrum, Agile Modeling, Extreme Programming, Kanban, Agile Data, SAFe and more, in a tailorable and scalable manner. They have learned how to implement the Disciplined Agile tool kit to choose their way of working.
5ceefd25-46a5-41ae-89ea-893c0844f3dd.name: Disciplined Agile Scrum Master (DASM)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Disciplined Agile Scrum Master 2-day training workshop
90 minutes, 50 questions, multiple choice, online, non-proctored
Must earn 7 PDUs in agile topics per one-year cycle to maintain certification.

5277de0d-0678-40ec-a3e0-61f59bb99e76.description: Earners of the globally-recognized PMI Professional in Business Analysis (PMI-PBA) have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of business analysis concepts, tasks, and techniques. Earners are able to assess business needs to help develop an effective solution to a problem or opportunity. Individuals that earn this certification work with stakeholders to define requirements, shape project outputs or products, and drive intended business outcomes.
5277de0d-0678-40ec-a3e0-61f59bb99e76.name: PMI Professional in Business Analysis (PMI-PBA)®

alignments.name: Business Analysis Practice Guide
alignments.description: The PMI-PBA certification aligns with Business Analysis for Practitioners: A Practice Guide, which tackles project-related issues associated with requirements and business analysis.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: With a four-year degree: 36 months (3 years) of business analysis experience and 35 contact hours of education in business analysis
Without a four-year degree: 60 months (5 years) of business analysis experience and 35 contact hours of education in business analysis
With a degree from a GAC accredited program: 24 months (2 years) experience and 35 contact hours of education in business analysis.
Successfully complete the 200 multiple-choice question, 4 hour PMI-PBA® certification exam
Earn 60 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PMI-PBA certification.

39e1a662-1feb-4caf-be12-7ad169db8209.description: Disciplined Agile is a toolkit that focuses on the decisions one needs to consider, the options available, and the associated trade-offs. The Disciplined Agile Senior Scrum Master credential holder has been formally evaluated on how to choose, scale and tailor their Way of Working (WoW) to achieve agile success in any situation. They are positioned to successfully lead an agile team (or multiple teams) and effectively take on more complex and key initiatives for their organization.
39e1a662-1feb-4caf-be12-7ad169db8209.name: Disciplined Agile Senior Scrum Master (DASSM)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Disciplined Agile Senior Scrum Master 2-day training workshop
Two years of experience working in an agile team, ideally in a leadership role such as Disciplined Agile scrum master, scrum master, product owner, or architecture owner.
90 minutes, 50 questions, multiple choice, online, non-proctored
Must earn 7 PDUs in agile topics per one-year cycle to maintain certification.

180327e1-56f2-4a6e-a801-38d063998f8d.description: Earners of the globally-recognized Program Management Professional (PgMP) have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of program management concepts, tasks, and techniques that are applicable across virtually any industry and methodology. Earners have demonstrated the ability to manage multiple, related projects and navigate complex activities that span functions, organizations, regions or cultures and to align results with organizational goals.
180327e1-56f2-4a6e-a801-38d063998f8d.name: Program Management Professional (PgMP)®

alignments.name: Standard for Program Management
alignments.description: The PgMP certification aligns with the Standard for Program Management, which provides a detailed understanding of program management and promotes efficient and effective communication and coordination among various project management groups.

alignments.name: PMBOK® Guide
alignments.description: The PgMP certification references A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is the preeminent global standard for project management and provides the fundamental practices of the profession.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: With a four-year degree: Minimum of 48 months (four years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional project management experience (or PMP). Minimum of 48 months (four years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional program management experience

Without a four-year degree: A minimum of 48 months (four years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional project management experience or PMP. Minimum of 84 months (seven years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional program management experience

With a degree from a GAC accredited program: Minimum of 36 months (three years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional project management experience (or PMP). Minimum of 36 months (three years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional program management experience
Successfully pass a panel review evaluation and complete the 170 multiple-choice question, 4 hour PgMP® certification exam
Earn 60 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PgMP certification.

495fbbc0-61e5-4162-8a0a-54264ab3dbb3.description: Earners of Agile Hybrid Project Pro Micro-Credential have demonstrated their extensive knowledge of agile/hybrid project management concepts, tasks, and techniques that are applicable across virtually any industry. Earners can speak and understand the global language of managing agile/hybrid projects. Earners have demonstrated the knowledge and skills needed to manage project plans, scope, stakeholders, risks, budgets, compliance, resources, resolve issues and deliver value.
495fbbc0-61e5-4162-8a0a-54264ab3dbb3.name: Agile Hybrid Project Pro

alignments.name: PMBOK Guide
alignments.description: The Agile/Hybrid Micro-credential aligns to A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is the preeminent global standard for project management and provides the fundamental practices of the profession.

badge_template_activities.title: Must have successfully completed the assessment of Agile Hybrid Project Pro Micro-credential

995bf225-078b-47e8-ad76-c14e3ff9153b.description: Earners of the globally-recognized PMI Scheduling Professional (PMI-SP) have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of project scheduling concepts, tasks, and techniques. Individuals that earn this certification have demonstrated their ability to manage project activities, resources, and dependencies, all of which ultimately influence project outcomes.
995bf225-078b-47e8-ad76-c14e3ff9153b.name: PMI Scheduling Professional (PMI-SP)®

alignments.name: Practice Standard for Scheduling
alignments.description: The PMI-SP certification aligns with the Practice Standard for Scheduling, which details the actionable and objective measurement process for project schedules and schedule models.

alignments.name: PMBOK® Guide
alignments.description: The PMI-SP certification references A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide), which is the preeminent global standard for project management and provides the fundamental practices of the profession.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: With a four-year degree: A minimum of 24 months (two years) of professional project scheduling within the last five consecutive years. 30 contact hours of formal education in the specialized area of project scheduling

Without a four-year degree: A minimum of 36 months (three years) of professional project scheduling within the last five consecutive years. 40 contact hours of formal education in the specialized area of project scheduling

With a degree from a GAC accredited program: A minimum of 12 months (one year) of professional project scheduling within the last five consecutive years. 30 contact hours of formal education in the specialized area of project scheduling
Successfully complete the 170 multiple-choice question, 3.5 hour PMI-SP® certification exam
Earn 30 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PMI-SP certification.

1ed9d7ef-ab4b-403b-8fae-1b456b400dc8.description: Earners of the Authorized Training Partner Instructor badge possess a PMP® certification as well as Agile project experience. Through their knowledge and experience they have demonstrated their skill and expertise in preparing students to sit for the PMP® certification exam.
1ed9d7ef-ab4b-403b-8fae-1b456b400dc8.name: Authorized Training Partner Instructor - PMP

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a 2-day training course reviewing the technical aspects of the new PMP® exam, with added focus on agile and hybrid approaches. Additionally, they mastered new facilitation techniques in how modern learners learn and leading courses in a virtual environment.
Instructors must be certified PMP® credential holders and be in good standing with PMI.
Instructors must have agile project experience to teach PMP® exam prep courses.

50f72c27-d647-4751-8545-7359018c27e6.description: PMI Chapter Leadership Appreciation badge recognizes and celebrates our Chapter leadership volunteers who contribute ongoing service to their local organizations all throughout 2022. Thank you for all you do for PMI and your Chapter!
50f72c27-d647-4751-8545-7359018c27e6.name: Chapter Leader 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Chapter leaders are eligible for the award and become recipients if they are listed in the Component System and they volunteer for a PMI Chapter in an appointed/elected board role.

924fb05a-5694-443d-bdc8-53eeb1caced0.description: Earners of the globally-recognized Portfolio Management Professional (PfMP) have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of portfolio management concepts, tasks, and techniques. Earners have demonstrated advanced competency in the coordinated management of one or more portfolios to achieve strategic objectives. Individuals who earn the PfMP align projects, programs and operations with strategic objectives, investing resources in the right work to deliver the expected value.
924fb05a-5694-443d-bdc8-53eeb1caced0.name: Portfolio Management Professional (PfMP)®

alignments.name: Standard for Portfolio Management
alignments.description: The PfMP certification aligns to the Standard for Portfolio Management, which offers the most up-to-date information on accepted practices in portfolio management.

alignments.name: ISO 9001
alignments.description: PMI's certification program maintains ISO 9001 accreditation, which focuses on quality management and ensuring that products and services consistently meet customer’s requirements, and that quality is consistently improved.

badge_template_activities.title: With a four-year degree: Minimum of 96 months (eight years) of professional business experience. Minimum of 48 months (four years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional portfolio management experience

Without a four-year degree: Minimum of 96 months (eight years) of professional business experience. Minimum of 84 months (seven years) of unique non-overlapping professional portfolio management experience

With a degree from a GAC accredited program: Minimum of 96 months (eight years) of professional business experience. Minimum of 36 months (three years) of unique, non-overlapping, professional portfolio management experience
Successfully pass a panel review evaluation and complete the 170 multiple-choice question, 4 hour PfMP® certification exam
Earn 60 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PfMP certification.

b18dab68-b421-4261-b6a0-8709ecaf0652.description: The Wicked Problem Solving Practitioner course builds creative collaboration and problem-solving skills and provides the tools to guide a team to solve any problem. Visit us at www.wickedproblemsolver.com to learn more.
b18dab68-b421-4261-b6a0-8709ecaf0652.name: Wicked Problem Solving Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: The course teaches students how to solve problems especially through creative collaboration with groups. They learn the core elements of Wicked Problem Solving which includes leading with key questions, making ideas visible, and engaging with actions. Students must complete an online learning course with 5 hours of videos, 48 activities, and two 250 page books all of which takes 15 to 20 hours to finish.

8cdb7725-0e44-4b67-8012-e175487d7c5c.description: Las personas que obtienen la insignia Fundamentos de la Dirección de Proyectos Cascada de Kickoff poseen un entendimiento esencial de los procesos cascada y su terminología. Han demostrado comprender los conceptos importantes, que incluyen: cómo crear el charter del proyecto, identificar a las partes interesadas de los proyectos, escribir requerimientos claros, secuenciar y asignar trabajo, crear el cronograma del proyecto, crear planes de mitigación de riesgos, y cerrar un proyecto exitosamente
8cdb7725-0e44-4b67-8012-e175487d7c5c.name: Fundamentos de la Dirección de Proyectos Cascada

badge_template_activities.title: Complete el curso Fundamentos de la Dirección de Proyectos Cascada de Kickoff, incluyendo todas las actividades, lecciones, y módulos.

fd7ce28b-1960-4054-b12b-6d9e5d0db6aa.description: Earners of the PMI Project Management Ready™ badge have an understanding of the concepts within the growing field of project management, and the tools to apply this knowledge to a wide range of opportunities. They have been assessed and validated in the core concepts of project management, business analysis and traditional and agile methodologies used across industries globally. This industry recognized certification is built from a global practice analysis of project professionals.
fd7ce28b-1960-4054-b12b-6d9e5d0db6aa.name: PMI Project Management Ready™

badge_template_activities.title: The PMI Project Management Ready is aligned with Certiport’s  “Learn, Practice, Certify” model. Courseware, practice tests and the certification exam is offered through Certiport.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 3 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

5f555e82-7ee8-420b-8d86-f181081e8722.description: Organizational Transformation: Foundation not only shows you understand organizational transformation, it proves you’ve earned a role in the operational and cultural revolution businesses need. Earners of this badge have demonstrated that they can identify and describe transformational concepts. They understand what drives transformation. And they can apply the concepts of transformation to their own business and internal culture.
5f555e82-7ee8-420b-8d86-f181081e8722.name: Organizational Transformation: Foundation

badge_template_activities.title: Must have completed all the modules of the Organizational transformation I course
Successfully completed the examination of the Organizational transformation I

d638c330-b93c-4b64-87b4-afa6d0d6a166.description: Earners of the Authorized Training Partner Program badge are authorized by PMI to support the professional development needs of future or current PMI practitioners and stakeholders in their pursuit of PMI Credentials. Authorized Training Partners who deliver PMP exam prep have access to licensed PMP exam prep course materials, developed by PMI. Authorized Training Partners who deliver Disciplined Agile have access to licensed DA course materials, developed by PMI.
d638c330-b93c-4b64-87b4-afa6d0d6a166.name: Authorized Training Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Organizations must be a legal business entity for 3 years and pass a background and credit check.
Must have documented customer resolution issue process.
Must use PMI-provided course content for PMP® exam prep and/or DA® courses.
Instructors must complete Authorized Training Partner Train the Trainer – to teach exam prep courses.
Instructors must be certified PMP® and/or DASSM® credential holders and be in good standing with PMI and possess agile project experience to teach PMP® exam prep courses and/or DA® courses.

7c3c15d6-b0cb-49ff-95e6-7862f1c33c1c.description: Las personas que obtienen la insignia Fundamentos de la Dirección de Proyectos Ágiles de Kickoff poseen un entendimiento esencial de los procesos ágiles y su terminología. Ellas han demostrado comprender los conceptos clave, que incluyen: cómo establecer una visión clara, construir un equipo de alto desempeño, configurar un tablero scrum, crear una cartera e historias de usuarios, conducir una reunión de planificación de sprints, realizar un scrum diario, y mucho más.
7c3c15d6-b0cb-49ff-95e6-7862f1c33c1c.name: Fundamentos de la Dirección de Proyectos Ágiles

badge_template_activities.title: Complete el curso Fundamentos de la Dirección de Proyectos Ágiles de Kickoff, incluyendo todas las actividades, lecciones, y módulos.

e92c89fe-2636-4b43-8670-2c460ad15706.description: Earners of the CD-Trained Practitioner have demonstrated their knowledge of the tools & methodologies needed to efficiently create effective & scalable applications using low-code and no-code platforms, solving organizations' problems. Earners understand how to determine if a problem can be solved using citizen development, effectively brainstorm solutions, evaluate the challenges that an app must overcome, gather the data & resources needed, and bring a project to fruition.
e92c89fe-2636-4b43-8670-2c460ad15706.name: CD-Trained Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: 6-8 Hours of course work.
Assessment completed within course to achieve the CD-Trained Practitioner badge.

fe3829fb-d091-45f1-b353-6ffd9b4a21f6.description: Earners of the Citizen Developer Practitioner have demonstrated their knowledge of the tools & methodologies needed to efficiently create effective & scalable applications using low-code and no-code platforms, solving organizations' problems. Earners understand how to determine if a problem can be solved using citizen development, effectively brainstorm solutions, evaluate the challenges that an app must overcome, gather the data & resources needed, and bring a project to fruition.
fe3829fb-d091-45f1-b353-6ffd9b4a21f6.name: PMI Citizen Developer Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Must have completed all the modules of the PMI Citizen Developer Practitioner Course & Successfully completed the examination.

a2b1df99-62cd-473f-a6ed-59780ad6e757.description: Os profissionais que possuem a medalha do curso Kickoff Fundamentos do Gerenciamento de Projetos Waterfall possuem uma compreensão essencial dos processos e terminologias waterfall. Eles demonstraram possuir conceitos-chave, incluindo: como construir estatutos de projetos, conhecer as partes interessadas dos projetos, escrever requisitos claros, sequenciar e atribuir trabalhos, criar o cronograma do projeto, fazer planos de mitigação de riscos, e muito mais.
a2b1df99-62cd-473f-a6ed-59780ad6e757.name: Fundamentos do Gerenciamento de Projetos Waterfall

badge_template_activities.title: Complete o curso Fundamentos do Gerenciamento de Projetos Waterfall do Kickoff, incluindo todas as atividades, aulas e módulos.

ce0a8e03-2ca8-430d-bd9c-078687938680.description: Earners of Built Environment Project Communication Pro have demonstrated their understanding of effective communication techniques in Built Environment Projects. Earners are fully equipped to build communication plans, manage stakeholder communications, and use methods such as Obeya & commitment-based management. Tools such as project management information systems and compass diagnostic tool empower learner's communication skills.
ce0a8e03-2ca8-430d-bd9c-078687938680.name: Built Environment Project Communication Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Must have successfully passed the assessment of Built Environment Project Communication Pro
Must have successfully completed all the modules of the Built Environment Project Communication Pro course

8877f1c2-0765-4368-9a64-5f2bb7504394.description: Discover how to measure agile/lean teams and how to organize an effective agile metrics program
8877f1c2-0765-4368-9a64-5f2bb7504394.name: Agile Metrics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the DA Metrics course
Take the DA Metrics micro-certification exam after course completion

skills.name: Introducing Agile Metrics For High-Performing Teams
Understanding The Goals And Risks Of Measurement

cf73f9d7-f0ac-4a31-8dd7-85e631919d4d.description: Earners of the Authorized Training Partner Instructor - DASSM badge possess the DA Senior Scrum Master certification as well as has taught 100+ people on Agile practice within the past 3 years. Through their knowledge and experience, they have demonstrated their skill and expertise in preparing students to sit for the DA Senior Scrum Master certification exam.
cf73f9d7-f0ac-4a31-8dd7-85e631919d4d.name: Authorized Training Partner Instructor - DASSM

badge_template_activities.title: Instructors must be certified DA Senior Scrum Master credential holders and be in good standing with PMI.
DA Senior Scrum Master Instructors must possess Agile training experience. This is demonstrated through documentation that they have taught 100+ students on Agile practice within the past 3 years.

4bf393e7-c46f-4815-8c04-7c48b8ca6374.description: Earners of the Authorized Training Partner Instructor - DASM badge possess the DA Scrum Master certification as well as has taught 100+ people on Agile practice within the past 3 years. Through their knowledge and experience, they have demonstrated their skill and expertise in preparing students to sit for the DA Scrum Master certification exam.
4bf393e7-c46f-4815-8c04-7c48b8ca6374.name: Authorized Training Partner Instructor - DASM

badge_template_activities.title: Instructors must be certified DA Scrum Master credential holders and be in good standing with PMI.
DA Scrum Master Instructors must possess Agile training experience. This is demonstrated through documentation that they have taught 100+ students on Agile practice within the past 3 years.

b568dcd1-605d-4958-9d96-59eb2a30b8c3.description: Organizational Transformation: Implementation prepares learners to confront transformation initiatives with actionable approaches. Earners of this badge are well equipped to lead the front lines of transformation initiatives. The spectrum of tools, resources, and contextual knowledge in this program will empower learners to take a transformation to its fully realized, and ever-evolving state.
b568dcd1-605d-4958-9d96-59eb2a30b8c3.name: Organizational Transformation: Implementation

badge_template_activities.title: Must have completed all the modules of the Organizational transformation implementation course
Successfully passed the examination of the Organizational transformation Implementation.

eb3c075e-dae4-4318-9ff0-cdae43084a53.description: Os profissionais que possuem a medalha Fundamentos de Gerenciamento Ágil de Projetos do Kickoff têm uma compreensão essencial de processos ágeis e terminologia. Eles demonstraram possuir conceitos-chave, incluindo: como estabelecer uma visão clara, formar equipes de alto desempenho, criar um board de Scrum, criar um backlog e histórias de usuários, executar uma reunião de planejamento de sprint, realizar um Scrum diário, realizar uma revisão de sprint e retrospectiva, e mais
eb3c075e-dae4-4318-9ff0-cdae43084a53.name: Fundamentos de Gerenciamento Ágil de Projetos

badge_template_activities.title: Complete o curso Fundamentos de Gerenciamento Ágil de Projetos do Kickoff, incluindo todas as atividades, aulas e módulos.

efc925ab-66dc-4a7d-80b6-df027ddb9b1d.description: Organizational Transformation: Orchestration focuses on the ways a successful transformation is led – through market awareness, strategy, culture, and people. Earners of this badge have the confidence to oversee agile strategies and nurture a people-oriented organizational transformation. By combining the research, tools, and knowledge in this program, learners are enabled to reimagine their leadership persona and strategic abilities.
efc925ab-66dc-4a7d-80b6-df027ddb9b1d.name: Organizational Transformation : Orchestration

badge_template_activities.title: Must have completed all the modules of the Organizational transformation Orchestration course
Successfully passed the examination of the Organizational transformation Orchestration.

65d0aa3c-77fb-4308-890d-c3430e3a1ebb.description: Earners of the Citizen Developer Business Architect have demonstrated their knowledge of the tools and methodologies needed to manage citizen development teams, manage the governance processes, oversee the collaboration between stakeholders in IT and the business, and embed the organizational structures that underpin citizen development, guiding the organization through to citizen development maturity.
65d0aa3c-77fb-4308-890d-c3430e3a1ebb.name: PMI Citizen Developer Business Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Must have completed all of the modules in the PMI Citizen Developer Business Architect course and have successfully completed the examination.

f7b10970-6208-4905-a2ad-e96f789d8db4.description: Amplify Your Projects with the Latest Technology and Innovative Best Practices. Technology and innovation play a key role in fundamentally transforming the industry by helping professionals increase the productivity and profitability of their projects—and more effectively manage risk. Upon completion of the course, you will be eligible to test your understanding to earn a micro-credential badge.
f7b10970-6208-4905-a2ad-e96f789d8db4.name: Built Environment Technology and Innovation Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an e-learning module and then pass an online, non-proctored exam on it’s content to earn a digital badge.

skills.name: Cooperate with stakeholders to identify the best possible technology solutions

32c32821-24a1-4c08-b581-77080cd3c661.description: Disciplined Agile is a toolkit that focuses on the decisions one needs to consider, the options available, and the associated trade-offs. The Disciplined Agile Coach has demonstrated ability to guide teams on how to apply and optimize Disciplined Agile across the enterprise, establish credibility with organizational leadership, and help teams and organizations choose their way of working (WoW) and realize true business agility.
32c32821-24a1-4c08-b581-77080cd3c661.name: Disciplined Agile Coach (DAC)

badge_template_activities.title: Attain 3 years of experience as an agile coach
Complete the Disciplined Agile Coach training workshop
Score a passing grade on the Disciplined Agile Coach exam

bf0097d3-625b-498a-9290-47561965340d.description: For project managers and stakeholders in the engineering and construction fields. Implement metrics-oriented performance management processes to increase transparency, reduce waste, and proactively address global supply chain challenges.
bf0097d3-625b-498a-9290-47561965340d.name: Built Environment Performance and Materials Management Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Built Environment Performance and Materials Management Pro is a course and micro-credential bundle designed to help you enhance the efficiency and productivity of built environment projects. Complete the e-learning module and then pass an online, non-proctored exam on it’s content to earn the digital badge.

7005265f-9c2c-4cb8-9add-a7ce73115040.description: The Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultant has demonstrated how to use value stream management to create a tailored approach for any organization to accelerate delivery of value to their customers. It provides a combination of Lean, Flow, Theory of Constraints and Organizational Development theories and practices. The individual earning this badge has practiced what was learned in the DAVSC workshop and passed a final exam based on the role.
7005265f-9c2c-4cb8-9add-a7ce73115040.name: Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultant (DAVSC)- CERTIFIED

badge_template_activities.title: The Disciplined Agile™ Senior Scrum Master (DASSM™) certification to ensure in-depth knowledge of the DA tool kit and the hundreds of practices and strategies it contains
3 Years of Agile Experience
3-day training from a Disciplined Agile™ partner
90 minutes, 40 questions, multiple choice

f594db62-f987-4334-8153-1b49b812c828.description: Learn how to accelerate value delivery at scale for your organization and customers by using value stream mapping, agile budgeting, lean funding, and other techniques
f594db62-f987-4334-8153-1b49b812c828.name: Value Stream Management

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 7-hour course at your own pace
Score a passing grade on the exam

0cad75e1-e7d6-477a-b9fd-f090e50ffe2b.description: Mastered the new facilitation techniques in how modern learners learn and leading courses in virtual environment covered in the 1-day modern learner class. Instructors must be certified Disciplined Agile Coach (DAC) and in good standing with the PMI. Instructors must have at least three years of agile coaching experience.
0cad75e1-e7d6-477a-b9fd-f090e50ffe2b.name: Authorized Training Partner Instructor - DAC

badge_template_activities.title: Instructors must be certified Disciplined Agile Coach (DAC) and in good standing with the PMI.
Instructors must have at least three years of agile coaching experience.

b6391527-5eeb-4dab-92e7-7a95a5d0fb53.description: Earners of the globally recognized PMI Construction Professional in Built Environment Projects (PMI-CP)™ have demonstrated their extensive knowledge and mastery of construction and built environment concepts, tasks, and techniques. Earners have competence in the specialized area of planning, managing, reporting and communicating construction projects from initial planning through delivery.
b6391527-5eeb-4dab-92e7-7a95a5d0fb53.name: Construction Professional in Built Environment Projects

badge_template_activities.title: To be eligible for the PMI-CP certification, you must first complete 4 e-learning courses and 3 course and micro-credential bundles
3 years of experience in the construction/built environment field
Successfully complete the 170 question, 230 minute PMI-CP™ certification exam
Earn 30 professional development units (PDUs) every three years to maintain the PMI-CP certification.

skills.name: Understand how Agile concepts can be utilized in the construction field
Understand how to incorporate Lean concepts in the construction world
Understand how to use data-driven analytics to formulate decisions in the construction field

f2e93e99-e449-4b30-a8cc-9a553071be0d.description: Mastered the new facilitation techniques in how modern learners learn and leading courses in virtual environment covered in the 1-day modern learner class. Instructors must be certified Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultants (DAVSC), undergone a series of co-training with other DAVSCI and be in good standing with the PMI. Instructors must have at least three years of agile training and coaching experience.
f2e93e99-e449-4b30-a8cc-9a553071be0d.name: Authorized Training Partner Instructor - DAVSC

badge_template_activities.title: Instructors must be certified Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultants (DAVSC) and have undergone a series of co-training with other DAVSCI. Instructors must be in good standing with PMI.
Must have at least three years of agile training and coaching experience.

f0ea1de0-2e01-470c-8420-c8e7fc255c67.description: Disciplined Agile Consulting Partners are a community of Agile-Lean professionals with dedicated Agile transformation services to help organizations quickly and effectively maximize the capabilities of Disciplined Agile. They offer both Agile-Lean training and consulting services.
f0ea1de0-2e01-470c-8420-c8e7fc255c67.name: Disciplined Agile Consulting Partner (DACP)

badge_template_activities.title: A DACP is an authorized training partner with the following certifications in good standing: three DASSM certifications, three DA Consultant Certifications, and one qualified DA Instructor.

9ec7d37b-ae61-4062-a079-cee85ab6b55f.description: Disciplined Agile is a toolkit that focuses on the decisions one needs to consider the options available and the associated trade-offs. The Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultant workshop teaches how to use value stream management to create a tailored approach for any organization to accelerate delivery of value to their customers. The DAVSC Trained designation shows the individual has completed the 3-day DAVSC training workshop.
9ec7d37b-ae61-4062-a079-cee85ab6b55f.name: Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultant (DAVSC)- TRAINED

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Disciplined Agile Value Stream Consultant training workshop
